page.title: 19SOCIAL LIFE IN CROUGHTON 3
page.content: Organisations such as the Friends of Croughton School, Church and Conservatives hold Cheese and Wine and other Social Evenings with Food to raise money. Croughton is known for providing good refreshments! The same group of sixty or so people are nearly always present at all these functions. The fact that every family has a car means that opeople do not rely on the village for entertainment as they used to. In addition, the increased mobility of families means that many people visit relatives at weekends, and the weekly shopping expedition is common, either to nearby towns or further afield to Milton Keynes or Oxford.
